title: Database Design
contents: Design the database schema for the CRM system, including tables for customers, contacts, leads, and interactions.

title: User Interface Design
contents: Design the user interface for the CRM system, focusing on usability and user experience.

title: Implement Contact Management Feature
contents: Implement the feature to manage contacts, including adding, editing, and deleting contacts.

title: Performance Optimization
contents: Optimize the performance of the e-commerce platform, focusing on page load times and server response times.

title: Implement Product Recommendations
contents: Implement a feature to provide personalized product recommendations based on user behavior and purchase history.

title: Enhance Security Measures
contents: Enhance the security measures of the e-commerce platform, including implementing HTTPS and preventing SQL injection attacks.

title: UI/UX Design
contents: Design the user interface and user experience for the mobile app, focusing on simplicity and ease of use.

title: Implement Authentication System
contents: Implement a secure authentication system for the mobile app, including login and registration functionalities.

title: Integrate Push Notifications
contents: Integrate push notifications to keep users informed about updates and promotions.

title: Data Collection
contents: Set up data collection mechanisms to gather relevant data for the analytics dashboard.

title: Dashboard Design
contents: Design the visual layout of the data analytics dashboard, focusing on presenting information in a clear and concise manner.

title: Implement Data Visualization
contents: Implement data visualization techniques to represent data in graphs, charts, and tables.

title: Assess Current Infrastructure
contents: Assess the current on-premises infrastructure to identify resources and dependencies that need to be migrated to the cloud.

title: Develop Migration Plan
contents: Develop a detailed plan for migrating resources to the cloud, including timelines, resources, and potential risks.

title: Execute Migration
contents: Execute the migration plan, ensuring minimal downtime and data loss during the migration process.
